pages.text: Become mighty and powerful with the power of blood, but not quite Blood Magic.

To get started, mine some Dark Ore to obtain Dark Gems. Use these to craft a Blood Extractor (which can be combined with more to increase capacity). Slay mobs with it in your inventory to gain blood. Use some of the blood in the world and wait for it to solidify. Break it with a flint and steel. Use these as crafting ingrediants and fuel for a Blood Infuser and other tools and ingredients but be sure to make a Vengeance Pickaxe to get the Crushed Dark Gems you'll need!

Evilcraft has quite a lot of blood-based machinery to help you with your crafting needs - even custom magic flying brooms! You can infuse certain things to make them stronger, and even use blood to repair items.  It also adds in a variety of monster spawns that are guaranteed to make your life easier, but don't despair.  Because you can transform biomes as you please now.
